mapper.insert: insert into member(member_id, member_pw, member_nickname, member_email, member_contact, member_birth, member_post, member_addr1, member_addr2, member_level, member_point, member_join, member_login, member_change) values(#{memberId},#{memberPw},#{memberNickname},#{memberEmail},#{memberContact},#{memberBirth},#{memberPost},#{memberAddr1},#{memberAddr2},#{memberLevel},#{memberPoint},#{memberJoin},#{memberLogin},#{memberChange})
